title: Hostings Schema
description: Schema for validating the hostings.yaml file

name.description: The name of the hosting provider

url.description: The website URL of the hosting provider

description.description: A brief description of the hosting provider

privacy_policy.description: URL to the provider's privacy policy

terms_of_service.description: URL to the provider's terms of service

lowendtalk_profile.description: URL to the provider's LowEndTalk profile

asn.description: Autonomous System Number (ASN) of the provider

looking_glass.description: URL to the provider's Looking Glass tool (if available)

dmca_ignored.description: Indicates if the provider ignores DMCA takedowns

ddos_protection.description: Indicates if the provider offers DDoS protection

stateful_protection.description: Indicates if DDoS protection is stateful

max_ddos_capacity_tbps.description: Maximum DDoS protection capacity in Tbps (if known)

items.description: Hosting types offered by the provider
Cryptocurrencies accepted by the hosting provider
Other payment methods accepted by the hosting provider

other_payment_methods.description: List of other accepted payment methods
